home.title: AI Cube - Home
home.description: Welcome to AI Cube – Learn AI Through Play. A simulation-based learning platform.

hero.title: AI CUBE.
hero.tagline: Ancient wisdom, future tech. We decode the AI enigma, empowering your child to build tomorrow.
hero.subheading: Transform your child's curiosity into creative mastery. AI Cube offers a mythic learning odyssey where young minds forge the critical AI skills to not just navigate the future, but to sculpt it.
hero.caption: Enrolling now: The architects of the next intelligence.

access.thisIs: AI Cube is more: It's an interactive codex, unlocking your child’s innate genius to sculpt the future of intelligence.
access.quote: "The world your child will inherit is built on AI. This gives them the keys."
access.trySnake3: Begin the Serpent's Trial: Your First Glimpse Inside the Cube

core.classifierVoice: **Sculpt** cosmic patterns. **Train** your AI to perceive hidden orders and classify the unseen. Unveil the logic within chaos.
core.predictorVoice: **Forecast** future events. **Master** the art of probability and guide your AI to anticipate outcomes. The threads of destiny await your weave.
core.visionVoice: **Decode** visual enigmas. **Empower** your AI to interpret complex imagery and recognize subtle anomalies. See beyond the veil.
core.ethicsStatus: Unlocked via Trial: The Guardian's Code
core.ethicsVoice: **Navigate** moral mazes. **Instill** your AI with a core of wisdom to make just choices. The balance of creation is in your hands.
core.reinforcementVoice: **Forge** adaptive intelligence. **Guide** your AI through trial and triumph to learn optimal strategies. Shape an evolving mind.
core.generativeStatus: Phase 3 Access: The Dream Weaver's Loom
core.generativeVoice: **Create** novel realities. **Unleash** your AI's potential to synthesize original art, music, and narratives. Breathe life into imagination.
core.decisionTreesStatus: Unlocked via Trial: The Cartographer's Compass
core.decisionTreesVoice: **Chart** pathways of choice. **Construct** intricate decision models for your AI to navigate complex scenarios. Every branch a new possibility.
core.neuralNetworkStatus: Phase 2 Access: The Mind Architect's Blueprint
core.neuralNetworkVoice: **Architect** interconnected thought. **Build** the foundational structures of an artificial mind, layer by layer. The nexus of intelligence awaits.
core.foundersStatus: Phase 4 Access: The Genesis Protocol (Coming Soon)
core.foundersVoice: **Ascend** to ultimate creation. **Synthesize** all learned wisdom to design a truly emergent AI. The final enigma of the Cube.

parentPortal.title: Parent Portal

classifier-construct.name: Classifier Construct
classifier-construct.description: A game about building and testing classifiers.

crystal-resonance.name: Crystal Resonance
crystal-resonance.description: Explore the world of crystal resonance.

decision-tree-game.name: Decision Tree Game
decision-tree-game.description: Navigate through a decision tree to solve puzzles.

neural-forge.name: Neural Forge
neural-forge.description: Forge neural networks in this interactive game.

neural-network-chamber.name: Neural Network Chamber
neural-network-chamber.description: Experiment with neural networks in a dedicated chamber.

predictor-engine-game.name: Predictor Engine
predictor-engine-game.description: Test your prediction skills with the Predictor Engine.

reinforcement-lab.name: Reinforcement Lab
reinforcement-lab.description: Learn about reinforcement learning in this lab.

snake-3.name: Snake 3.0
snake-3.description: A modern take on the classic Snake game.

vision-system.name: Vision System
vision-system.description: Explore the mechanics of a vision system.

philosophy.title: The Heart of AI Cube: Our Philosophy
philosophy.subtitle: Discover the core principles that drive our educational games and experiences.

new_point1.title: Not your average subscription.
new_point1.description: This isn’t Netflix for math. It’s a simulator of minds — each payment unlocks more power.

new_point2.title: Not a linear course.
new_point2.description: There are no chapters. There are only riddles to decode, systems to master, and myths to forge.

new_point3.title: Not just a game.
new_point3.description: It’s gameplay with gravity — AI fluency disguised as play.

paymentPage.joinDescription: Select your desired key and unlock the power to build your own AI myths.
paymentPage.terms: By subscribing, you agree to our terms and conditions.
